Medium: 4 hectographed illustrations (3 by Zdanevich and 1 by Burliuk); hectographed manuscript text and designs and carbon copied typed text (8 pages printed on lined notebook paper and 4 pages on textured brown paper)
Artist: Vladimir Burliuk, Aleksei Kruchenykh, Kirill Zdanevich
CreditLine: Gift of The Judith Rothschild Foundation
Title: Tsvetistye tortsy
